front.title: Extensions to IS-IS for Layer-2 Systems

abstract.t: This document specifies the IS-IS extensions necessary to support link state routing to any protocols running directly over layer 2. While supporting this concept involves several pieces, this document only describes extensions to IS-IS. Furthermore, the TLVs described in this document are generic layer 2 additions and specific ones as needed are defined in the IS-IS technology specific extensions. We leave it to the systems using these IS-IS extensions to explain how the information carried in IS-IS is used.
